description: Extraordinary duplex in Villanueva del Pardillo Enge&Völkers presents this spacious duplex that combines style, comfort and great design in a quiet, residential location. With 190 useful meters, it offers a generous space to enjoy a quality family life. On the main floor we have the fully equipped kitchen. With large cabinets that offer a large storage space. A comfortable room that can serve as a bedroom or as a home office space. This provides versatility to meet personal needs. The spacious living room is the heart of the main floor, with enough space for a dining area and a living room. Abundant natural light illuminates the space, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. A full bathroom on this floor is perfect for visitors and for comfort. Two balconies that have been cleverly closed to increase the amplitude of the main floor. These spaces can be used as additional reading areas, greenhouses or living rooms. On the second floor, we will find two bedrooms with two bathrooms, one of them en suite. These private spaces offer comfort and privacy for residents. The terrace, this outdoor space offers a perfect place to relax, enjoy outdoor meals and enjoy panoramic views of the surrounding area. It has fitted wardrobes, a storage room and a garage. In short, this 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom duplex is an exceptional opportunity for those seeking the perfect combination of luxury, comfort and tranquility. It is in excellent condition. This property is an ideal place to create unforgettable memories and call it home. Do not hesitate to schedule a visit to personally experience the charm of this property. Villanueva del Pardillo, a charming municipality that offers an exceptional lifestyle thanks to its strategic location, first class communications and a wide range of services. It is located a few kilometers northwest of the city of Madrid with quick and easy access. The town is conveniently connected via the A-6 motorway, which facilitates travel to other important cities such as Segovia and Ávila. In addition, the M-509 allows you to move comfortably within the Region of Madrid. It has an efficient public transport network, which includes buses and Cercanías train connections. It has a variety of public and private schools, providing quality educational options. It has health centers and medical clinics that guarantee quality medical care for its residents. The city has a vibrant commercial life, with supermarkets, local shops and markets where you can find fresh produce and everything you need on a daily basis. Villanueva del Pardillo prides itself on its parks and green areas, providing spaces for recreation and outdoor exercise. Sports facilities include swimming pools and gyms. It organizes a variety of cultural events and festivals throughout the year, giving residents the opportunity to immerse themselves in the cultural richness of the area. Local restaurants and bars offer a delicious range of culinary options, from traditional dishes to international cuisine. In short, Villanueva del Pardillo is a town that combines a strategic location with a wide range of services and amenities. This place is perfect for those looking to live in a quiet environment without giving up access to the surrounding cities and all essential services. In short, it is a place that really gives you the best of both worlds.

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Las Vegas - Santa María, Villanueva del Pardillo', 'title': 'Detached house'}
description: Fantastic villa in Villanueva del Pardillo Engel&Völkers presents this single-family house, with two floors, in one of the most prestigious urbanizaciones in Villanueva del Pardillo, we are referring to the Santa María Urbanización. You can enjoy a wonderful garden of more than 1,600sqm, in which we can find several fruit trees, a small orchard, a barbecue area on a large floor area, a small lake with a natural stone waterfall, a saline chlorination pool and a toilet next to the pool. The entire garden has automated irrigation and each plant has its corresponding drip. It has various light outlets throughout the garden. The house is made up of two floors, on the main floor we find a spacious living room, with access to a large glazed porch where there are wonderful views of the garden. From this porch we have access to the kitchen, which is modern, with a large office, and very bright. In the rest area we find the master bedroom, with an en-suite bathroom, a hydromassage bathtub and a large dressing room. There are also two bedrooms that share a large living room and a full bathroom. It should be noted that all the windows are tilt-and-turn climatit, with electric metal security shutters. The heating is centralized with oil and also has solar panels. On the lower floor we have a large living room, which leads to a wonderful bedroom with a complete bathroom en suite and a hydromassage shower. The entire property is in a good state of conservation and in a very quiet area close to primary services and transport that communicate with Villanueva del Pardillo, Majadahonda and Madrid. Villanueva del Pardillo is a town in full growth, more than 17,000 registered inhabitants, while maintaining that spirit of tranquility and comfort that is so difficult to find today. It has several bus lines and bus stops very close to the urbanization, which connect Madrid - Moncloa in 20-25 minutes, Las Rozas, Majadahonda and other towns such as Villanueva de la Cañada or Valdemorillo and Colmenar Viejo. Three public schools, two of them bilingual and two bilingual schools, Vallmont and Antavilla, among other educational offers. Cultural and leisure activities can be found in the Sebastián Estero Municipal Auditorium and the Tamara Rojo Cultural Center. There is also a Senior Center where different activities are held and let's not forget the gastronomic offer of Villanueva del Pardillo, to enjoy at any time. The communication by the M-509 leads us to towns like Majadahonda or Las Rozas and the M-50, from which you can access in a few minutes to the Gran Plaza 2 Shopping Center, among others.".

description: Located 26 km from Madrid and nestled in the natural environment of the Guadarrama Basin is Villanueva del Pardillo, a town very close to Majadahonda, Las Rozas de Madrid, Villanueva de la Cañada, Galapagar and Valdemorillo. In this environment and location we have available for sale this fantastic semi-detached house cared for in detail and ready to move into. It is a three-story house, with 175 square meters built on a 198-meter plot and is distributed as follows: LOW LEVEL - Living room with fireplace from which we access a large garden, with enough space to build a swimming pool. - A courtesy toilet. - Kitchen, to which the current owners gave more space by adding the terrace to this room, and turning this area into a wonderful corner where you can have breakfast, lunch and dinner. - A double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and direct access to the garden. This room has two possible accesses; from inside the house and from the main entrance of the house. Which allows it to become an area independent from the rest of the house and is perfect for guests. FIRST FLOOR Here we find the rest area - A very large master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, a large closet and a fantastic dressing room with a window, which provides magnificent natural light to the room. - Two single bedrooms. - Bathroom with shower tray. - And a beautiful room with an exposed wooden beam ceiling, which is currently used as a gym and has a brand new sauna. ATTIC - An open space with under-deck cabinets with large storage capacity Give yourself the opportunity to see this home and see if it is the house you want to live in. We do not charge any type of commission to buyers and we have financial advisors to help you if you need it.

description: The most exclusive housing development in Villanueva del Pardillo, 24 semi-detached houses located in a privileged enclave in front of a protected natural terrain, green areas and with visits to the Sierra de Guadarrama, a guarantee of tranquility and nature. The technical team of the LABRANDERO group has achieved a modern style design and great aesthetic beauty without sacrificing functionality. Sloping facades and roofs as well as a set of twinned volumes add great dynamism to the house. Because we know the importance and enthusiasm of buying a home, we want to give you the opportunity to participate and personalize your future home from day one, so we put our technical team at your service to help you find the best option for you. adapt to your needs. More than 25 years of experience in the promotion and construction of new residential construction homes support us. At LABRANDERO we pride ourselves on being a family business, with a strong involvement in our daily work, thanks to this we have managed to maintain our hallmark throughout 3 generations.

description: PROTECTED HOUSES OF 2 AND 3 BEDROOMS WITH TERRACE. GROUNDS WITH GARDEN AND DUPLEX. WITH HIGH ENERGY EFFICIENCY WORK LICENSE REQUESTED LAND OWNED BY THE COOPERATIVE GUARANTEED QUANTITIES Discover what quality of life means with this residential project of 53 subsidized homes with 2 and 3 bedrooms, ground floors with gardens and duplex homes. Common areas with pool, play area and green area. Residencial Parque de la Rosa is a project designed for those who like to enjoy nature and the freedom of breathing fresh air. Breathe and feel that you are home Homes that take care of the environment and help you reduce your monthly energy bill thanks to the energy efficiency measures that incorporate: SATE-type façade, AEROTHERMAL SYSTEM, DOUBLE GLAZING AND UNDERFLOOR HEATING AND REFRESHING. The common area of the houses is the perfect place to collect unforgettable moments thanks to its large green areas, swimming pool to cool off on the hottest days and children's area for the little ones to enjoy. The practical and functional design are the hallmarks of this project whose protagonist is light, thanks to the fact that all homes have a terrace. Imagine being able to enjoy endless afternoons in the company of friends and family in your favorite place in the house, the terrace. Imagine the comfort of coming home and not having to waste time looking for a parking space, since all the homes have a garage and storage room. Quality of life and tranquility in the middle of nature Nestled in the natural environment of the Guadarrama Basin, your new home is located in Villanueva del Pardillo, an area surrounded by green spaces where you can enjoy tranquility and quality of life in contact with nature. A perfectly communicated municipality, just 20 minutes from the capital, through highways such as the A-6, M-50 or M-40 and roads such as M-503 and M-509. By public transport, it has several bus lines that connect with the Moncloa interchange and with other municipalities in the area such as Las Rozas or Majadahonda (lines 642 and 643). A municipality that has all the services you may need in your day to day: supermarkets, sports facilities, health centers, educational centers and green areas. Are you imagining it? If you do not want to imagine and you want to know it, call us and book a visit with our commercial. You are one step away from knowing your home.
